page.title: 12KEELBY PEOPLES OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Mrs Hay asked us all what our parents jobs were and eight people had parents that were teachers.The next one which had the most people in was the haulage business,people who work on lorries that drive about the country.The next one is the domestic work which is when you do house work or clean in hotels as my mum does.Most of these were our mothers.There are five people who work at the oil industry Conoco and Lindsey oil refinery near the Humberbank.It's very surprising that although farming is a big business there is only one person working on a farm.Many people work in offices and factories in Grimsby and Immingham.
